Title: Establishes a housing court
Summary: Establishes a housing court for actions and proceedings involving the enforcement of state and local laws for the establishment and maintenance of housing standards; requires such court to establish an escrow account; provides that any landlord that owns twenty units or less shall be entitled to free legal services if such landlord can prove a loss of at least twenty percent of rent payments in a calendar year; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add Art 4-B ยง135-a, Judy L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to establishing a new housing court part for certain homes
